transcript:
Hello?
Executive: Arun sir good morning Sandhya bol rahi thi India Mart office se senior manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne morning mein bola tha na connect karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan abhi gadi chala raha hai na road pe nahi aaya driver nahi aaya hum gadi chala raha hai aadha ghante ka baad phone karega.
Executive: Main 10:30 pe connect kar leti hu fir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called as requested in the morning.

- Customer is currently driving and will be available in half an hour.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back at 10:30.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to neutral



@@@Key Topics:

callback, rescheduling
